data.name: Konduktor
data.detailed_description:
In the region which your carriage goes through, there was a technological disaster. You are in an isolated area and have been assigned to assist to eliminate the disaster. Your task is to evacuate the inhabitants of local villages and townships, collect information about the incident, and research anomalous places. You have to drive and maintain the locomotive. Check all passenger documents and their belongings. If it is necessary, carry out detentions with the use of force.

FEATURES



  • Check the availability of travel tickets, passports; raise travel payment and issue tickets, impose and gather fine payments; search for prohibited items in passenger luggage; arrest offenders; respond to passengers favors and complaints.
  • At the stations, exchange with the inhabitants of the region; unload food cargo; Explore abandoned stations in search of valuable resources, from which you can create parts for a train, or find simple medicines for those in need, or even ingredients to make a soup.
  • Drive the electric locomotive, keep it in good working order and proper sanitary and hygienic condition; identify and resolve malfunctions in time; control the temperature in the rooms; notify about the imminent arrival at the station.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Konduktor is an adventure with survival elements from the perspective of a conductor whose trip was interrupted by a sudden disaster. The region is isolated and declared as an alienation zone. You have been ordered to assist in the evacuation of residents from the disaster area.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7
  • Processor: 3.4GHz Intel i7 2600Â± or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD5850 or equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
